original_text: Then Isaiah the prophet came to King Hezekiah, and said to him, “What did these men say? And from where did they come to you?” And Hezekiah said, “They have come from a far country, from Babylon.”
korean_text: 선지자 이사야가 히스기야 왕에게 나아와 그에게 이르되 이 사람들이 무슨 말을 하였으며 어디서부터 왕에게 왔나이까 히스기야가 이르되 먼 지방 바벨론에서 왔나이다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then Isaiah the prophet came to King Hezekiah,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 이사야 선지자가 히스기야 왕에게 와서

sentences.original_text: And from where did they come to you?
They have come from a far country,
